Title: Sometimes
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Bekah Brunstetter, Eboni Freeman (staff writer), Laura Kenar (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Kevin and Zoe land in Vietnam; in the past, Jack and Rebecca take a road trip to Los Angeles; Jack's war story continues to be revealed.
